import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { Form, Button, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../components/FormConatiner' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' import { savePaymentMethod } from '../actions/cartActions' const PaymentScreen = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const { shippingAddress } = cart if (!shippingAddress) { navigate('/shipping') } const [paymentMethod, setPaymentMethod] = useState('PayPal') const dispatch = useDispatch() const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(savePaymentMethod(paymentMethod)) navigate('/placeorder') } return (

Paymet Method

Select Method setPaymentMethod(e.target.value)} >
) } export default PaymentScreen
